  • Vignettes

Prepares selected indexes in the democracy dataset for use in a UD model

Prepares selected indexes in the democracy dataset for use in a UD model

prepare_democracy(indexes)

Arguments

indexes
a set of measures of democracy in the democracy dataset. They must be names of the columns of the democracy dataset - otherwise the function throws an error.

Value

A dataset ready for use with democracy_model

Examples

prepare_democracy(names(democracy)[grep("pmm",names(democracy))])
